website_summaries.verdict: An attractive soft-sided 5-piece luggage set with small and large pieces that provide enough space to pack for your next trip, all for a decent price.
pros: A comprehensive set that comes with 5 pieces, including a 29 in
Made of polyester material that's lightweight, durable, and expandable
cons: Bags arrive with strange odor that fades, though it takes several weeks or months
Some durability issues noted, including broken zippers and fraying seams with typical use

customer_reviews.title: Great price but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: So I had to give this luggage at least two stars because you get so much for the price. However....the quality is really not there. Materials are pretty cheap and flimsy and the liner inside each suitcase feels like a thin piece of plastic. One of the little luggage tag holders sewn to the back of one of the smaller suitcases is already half falling off and we haven’t even used it yet. :( Zipper on one of them is tough to zip and unzip.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. Looks nice and is a great set. 3 Large pieces and 2 carry ons. I haven't used them yet, but I am going away for a week and after ordering and returning 2 other sets of luggage I am excited about this set, definitely a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set of luggage to use on a cruise. It is definitely not American Tourister but is sturdy and held up well. Pros: Lightweight Has a zipper to expand the 3 wheeled pieces Nice variety in sizes All the pieces nest making storage a breeze No issues with the handles or wheels Cons: Interior lining is a bit thin. I worry about rips after continued use. We don't travel a lot so I don't see that being a problem for us. The included locks are low quality and 2 broke. Definitely worth the price we paid for the set! If you vacation occasionally, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: It survived a cruise, took all but one piece luggage. I purchased metal privacy address tags to attach to the handles, only to find there were hidden address tags built into the back of each large case. Very well constructed and no issues with zippers or lining coming out. All the telescopic handles worked great. They stack nicely and look cool. No complaints any where so far! Id buy again if I needed another set.
customer_reviews.author: ID I Am

customer_reviews.title: Would totally recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I decided on this luggage set. My family and I used these on a 10 day trip from Southwest Texas all the way to Northern Maine. They held up perfectly! I would recommend this set!!! And you just can’t beat the price! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Than-q-45

customer_reviews.title: as advertised...and a lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and it was as advertised. Stand out color from all the black luggage at the airport. Very sturdy and 'looks' like it will stand the test of time and baggage handlers. They have a different kind of handle (not on the telescoping wheelie) and I'm interested to see if that is a better idea than sewn in ones, but then again how often is that ever used. They nest nicely in storage and the two shoulder and hand carry bags will come in handy in additional carry on and cruise situations (before the big luggage arrives). All said, I'm happy with my purchase and the price of $95 bucks can't be beat for 5 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: john a.

customer_reviews.title: Withstood the trip to PR
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his girlfriend were travelling to Puerto Rico for a vacation this summer, so I got this set for them. It was the first time he had done any travelling, but she was visiting relatives on the island. They used the various pieces and were quite appreciative of the gift. It held up well to their trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage, arrived torn.
customer_reviews.text: The luggage arrived as described and is nice with the exception of the interior lining. It seems to be kind of fragile and the largest piece even arrived with a tear that seems to be caused just from packing the smaller piece inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not good for return
customer_reviews.text: It looks ok if you need to return it forget it too expensive 40 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: JROLON

customer_reviews.title: Great Suitecase
customer_reviews.text: VERy nice quality suitcase and they look great. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Damages easy
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when it arrived and looked great until our first use and the product was already damaged when it has been only put up till the trip came I would have bought better luggage than this was very disappointed but got it for the great deal
customer_reviews.author: Reviews matter

customer_reviews.title: Flieks 5 Piece Luggage Set Deluxe Expandable Rolling Suitcase (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality affordable luggage we took on our first cruise and so many pieces to choose from based on how long you will be gone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fair product
customer_reviews.text: Not high quality or durable but will look nice for a trip or two
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: My child enjoyed them and use them all the time would definitely recommend them again
customer_reviews.text: My child enjoyed them and use them all the time would definitely recommend them again
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable! Perfect set!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bags! We travel a lot and they have proved very durable thus far! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hajek

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have my very own set of luggage. Wasn't exactly what I was expecting. The luggage is smaller than expected especially the two bags. It will do. As far as quality, I am not sure because I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyLucy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great haven't used it yet. Bags have locks on them.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: the zippers are not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: the zippers on two of these bags keep on malfunction....i was able to use it on my recent vacation, but overall it is lovely and very lightweight as mentioned in other reviews
customer_reviews.author: D.morrison

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Set
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful set came in two days. It's attractive, sturdy, and will fit a few of my traveling needs. I look forward to seeing how they hold up for my first vacation with them. I will keep everyone posted!
customer_reviews.author: Simcha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price we paid we are more than thrilled with this purchase! We now have a set that will accommodate our family. Definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Hiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love it! cant wait to use them on vacation! got get soon than expected
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bloyd

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and color scheme
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and color scheme, it makes the luggage very easy to spot at the airport baggage claim area.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Very durable and heavy. Way smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the pull out handle on the large suitcase was defective and broke off totally on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ropes
